title: Bug splat when connecting to game
body: I'm not sure if it's because of the new windows update but every time I try to connect to a game right after champ select ends the screen goes black then redirects me to the client with a bugsplat error. I can not play the game at all and am having a pretty hard time finding solutions. I've tried repairing the game restarting my computer and updating drivers but nothing works.

replies.body: This crash could be due to corrupt game files, or outdated drivers caused by the windows update.  To find out more and get this fixed up, our[ game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide would be the guide to check!  Hopefully, this will get you fixed up but let me know if you have issues afterwards.

I've already tried everything on the list and the crashes continue. I don't know what to do the only thing I haven't tried is entirely reinstalling the game but that is something I want to avoid if possible.

Thanks for the follow up!  Submit a player support ticket, and our tech team can look into this and figure out what's going on.  I also recommend gathering a set of logs with our[ hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), and attach it to your ticket.  We'll respond asap!
Have you tried any of the solutions found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)?
